channel.title: *v* Rune Pure Stat Help *v*
channel.description:
Hello dear reader,
I have got a pure with these stats, F2P:
40 Attack 55 Strength 40 Defence 14 Prayer 47 Hitpoints 1 Magic 1 Prayer
I'm asking anyone if they have got any ideas for a F2P PKer...Any chance of my still being pure? What stats would own in F2P?
Thanks in advanced!

item.title: *v* Rune Pure Stat Help *v*
item.dc:creator: @cardboardcorn cardboardcorn
item.description:
@cardboardcorn wrote:

[quote=“Tarantula, post:12, topic:6490”]Hi, i need some help to make pure.
Current stats:
Attack: 38
Strenght: 42
Hp: 36
All rest stats: 1

What about prayer?
Mage? And range?[/quote]

31-34 Prayer
59 mage
40 range

Read full topic

item.title: *v* Rune Pure Stat Help *v*
item.dc:creator: @saltnpepper saltnpepper
item.description:
@saltnpepper wrote:

hey a rune pure?
it’s kind of an oxymoron… since you need 40 def to wear rune…
you should go full pure with 1 def… you have more power + cheaper
but if you’re gonna go full rune i reccomend this:
99:def
70+ Att…
strength if you want to…
anything else you can have… you’ll pretty much tank anyone… as rune pures are meant to be the tanks of wildy…the money tanks that is…
i can’t say this combo is good for the wildy… since you don’t want to tank, but kill quickly and cheaply (unless ur rich)
BUT
with your current stats you should make them this
40 Attack
HIGH Strength
40 Defence
14 Prayer
47 Hitpoints
HIGH Magic
1 Prayer

too keep yourself pure you should only raise your strength… and if you’re hardcore enough… you can also keep your combat level down by training your magic only by alching/laws/enchanting , etc. (this way your hp doesn’t raise and thus ur cb lvl doen’t rise)

Read full topic

item.title: *v* Rune Pure Stat Help *v*
item.dc:creator: @slayer215 slayer215
item.description:
@slayer215 wrote:

a good pure in f2p, hands down is
40 atk
75+ str
1 def…duh
59 MAGE FOR THE FUCKING DEF NOOBS (and rune nubs) THAT ARE IMPOSSIBLE TO KILL
75 range is unstoppable in the wild but i recommend for the hp
31 prayer
around 70-72 hp? somewhere in there depending on if you alched or not

Hes wearing green dhide chaps, semi full iron or monk robe top with a wizard hat.
He has a str pot (4), 100 deaths, 400 airs, 500 fires, and the rest lobbies
Bind runes are also pretty good.
Now a good MEMBERS pker is WAY different but we aint talking about members

Read full topic

item.title: *v* Rune Pure Stat Help *v*
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

No chance of you still being pure.

Stats that own in F2P are:
40 attack, 70 strength, 70 magic.
40 attack 60 strength 31 pray.
65 magic 65 ranged.
76 ranged.
